wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|December}}
Events that occurred on 1 December.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1897]]''' - Actor [[Cyril Ritchard]] is born.
* '''[[1913]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] is elected president of Stapledon Society, a student body at [[wikipedia:Exeter College, Oxford|Exeter College]].
* '''[[1914]]''' - Tolkien's close friend at [[Oxford University|Oxford]], [[Geoffrey Bache Smith]], enters service with the Oxfordshire and Buckinghamshire Light Infantry. 
* '''[[1953]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] writes [[Letter 141d]].
* '''[[1954]]''' - [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] starts writing [[Letter to Rayner Heppenstall (1-2 December 1954)|a letter to Rayner Heppenstall]].
* '''[[1975]]''' - ''[[An Extrapolation on The Silmarillion]]'' is published.
* '''[[1976]]''' - Actor [[Dean O'Gorman]] is born.
* '''[[1986]]''' - ''[[Evocation of Virgil in Tolkien's Art]]'' is published.
* '''[[1995]]''' - ''[[J.R.R. Tolkien (Writers and Their Work)]]'' is published.
* '''[[2003]]''' - ''[[Gollum: How We Made Movie Magic]]'' is published.
* '''[[2003]]''' - ''[[Tolkien: A Cultural Phenomenon]]'' is published.
* '''[[2003]] – ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]'' premières in Wellington, [[New Zealand]].'''
* '''[[2007]]''' - ''[[Chesterton and Tolkien as Theologians]]'' is published.
* '''[[2009]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online: Siege of Mirkwood]]'' expansion is released in North America.
* '''[[2009]]''' - ''[[Born of Hope]]'' is released online.
* '''[[2010]]''' - ''[[Middle-earth and Beyond|Middle-earth and Beyond: Essays on the World of J.R.R. Tolkien]]'' is published.
* '''[[2014]] - ''[[The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies]]'' premières in [[wikipedia:Leicester Square|Leicester Square]], London.'''
* '''[[2016]]''' - ''[[A Well of Wonder|A Well of Wonder: C. S. Lewis, J. R. R. Tolkien, and The Inklings]]'' is published.
* '''[[2017]]''' - ''[[Death and Immortality in Middle-earth]]'' is published.
